sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentences.en: Even his own mother would not have recognized him.
sentences.cn: 即使他的亲生母亲也会认不出他的。

sentences.en: He got out of bed and pulled on his bathrobe.
sentences.cn: 他起床后穿上了晨衣。

sentences.en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentences.en: He shouted at his brother, his neck veins bulging.
sentences.cn: 他朝他的兄弟吼叫，脖子上青筋暴突。

sentences.en: He stated his views to me.
sentences.cn: 他向我说明了他的观点。

sentences.en: He took my hand in his.
sentences.cn: 他握住我的手。

sentences.en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

sentences.en: his and hers towels.
sentences.cn: 情侣毛巾。

sentences.en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentences.cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentences.en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
sentences.cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

sentences.en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentences.en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
sentences.cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

sentences.en: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
sentences.cn: 他一字一顿，听上去很生硬。

sentences.en: I like his car.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他的小汽车。

sentences.en: I love his sense of humour, don’t you?
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他的幽默感，你呢？

sentences.en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentences.cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentences.en: Leo took off his coat and sat down.
sentences.cn: 利奥脱掉大衣坐了下来。

sentences.en: Lewis denies that the child is his.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯否认那孩子是他的。

sentences.en: My eyesight is better than his.
sentences.cn: 我的视力比他的好。

sentences.en: My relatives all live in the States – his are in France.
sentences.cn: 我的亲戚都住在美国——他的亲戚都在法国。

sentences.en: That should be his mother.
sentences.cn: 那大概是他的母亲。

sentences.en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentences.cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentences.en: The opportunity had gone. His mind scrabbled for alternatives.
sentences.cn: 机会已经失去。他苦苦思索别的方案。

sentences.en: Too bad he used his intelligence for criminal purposes.
sentences.cn: 他把聪明都用在了犯罪上，太可惜了。

sentences.en: You have his card?
sentences.cn: 你有他的名片吧？

phrases.tran_cn: （配对物品）供夫妇用的，供男女用的

trans.tran_cn: 属于他的，用于名词前，自己的，指某人的，上帝的
trans.tran_en: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned
used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned

trans.tran_cn: (he的所有格)他的，(he的物主代词)他的东西
